Package org.hibernate.query.sqm.produce.function

@Incubating package org.hibernate.query.sqm.produce.function
Package defining support for SqmFunctionDescriptor handling.

Between ArgumentsValidator and FunctionReturnTypeResolver creating function templates is generally a simple matter of composition

  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.hibernate.query.sqm.produce.function.internal
     
  • Class
    Description
    ArgumentsValidator
    Validates the arguments provided to an HQL function invocation.
    ArgumentTypesValidator
    Typechecks the arguments of HQL functions based on the assigned JDBC types.
    FunctionArgumentException
    Represents a problem with the argument list of a function in HQL/JPQL.
    FunctionArgumentTypeResolver
    Pluggable strategy for resolving a function argument type for a specific call.
    FunctionParameterType
    A mini-"type system" for HQL function parameters.
    FunctionReturnTypeResolver
    Pluggable strategy for resolving a function return type for a specific call.

    NamedSetReturningFunctionDescriptorBuilder
     
    PatternFunctionDescriptorBuilder

    Pluggable strategy for resolving a function return type for a specific call.

    Pluggable strategy for resolving a function return type for a specific call.
